name: Champion
description: Champions focus on honing raw physical power and combat skills to deal devastating blows. They combine rigorous training with physical excellence to achieve greatness in battle.

improved_critical.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

remarkable_athlete.description: You can add half your proficiency bonus (rounded up) to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check that doesn't already use your proficiency bonus. When making a running long jump, the distance you cover increases by a number of feet equal to your Strength modifier.

additional_fighting_style.description: You can choose a second option from the Fighting Style class feature.

superior_critical.description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20.

survivor.description: At the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier if you have no more than half of your hit points left. You do not gain this benefit if you have 0 hit points.
